name: The Infinity Machine
description:
THE INFINITY MACHINE

Even immortality can't last forever. Your invention, THE INFINITY MACHINE, prolongs your life indefinitely. How? By blasting away anyone who comes for your soul. But they are getting very impatient, and more numerous by the night...

Work with, and occasionally around, your machine to survive as many nights as you can.

Controls
Move with [WASD] or [Arrows]

Credits

Art, Music & Programming by jpbash

Made in 3 days for MiniJam92

developer's top score: 3227 / 9 nights

Sound FX: https://sfxr.me/

Font: Half Bold Pixel 7 by Style7 - https://www.1001fonts.com/half-bold-pixel-7-font.html
